name: Caveman The Game
storyline: Even in Prehistoric times love existed. Play as the Caveman and help him rescue the love of his life who has been taken by a gang of rebel cavemen. Lead the Caveman through 20 levels of jumping over tarpits, climbing vines and fighting dinosaurs to free his love from the clutches of the rebel caveman gang!
summary: Even in Prehistoric times love existed. Play as the Caveman and help him rescue the love of his life who has been taken by a gang of rebel cavemen.
